statements: UPDATE DonorBehavior SET total_donations = 5000.0, last_donation_date = '2022-09-30' WHERE donor_id = 123
UPDATE DonorBehavior SET donor_name = 'John Smith', total_donations = 7500.50 WHERE donor_id = 456
UPDATE DonorBehavior SET last_donation_date = '2021-08-15', total_donations = total_donations + 100 WHERE donor_id = 101
UPDATE DonorBehavior SET total_donations = total_donations * 1.1, donor_name = 'John Doe' WHERE donor_id = 102
UPDATE donors SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE donor_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE donation_history SET donation_amount = 100.50 WHERE donor_id = '98765432-1234-5678-4321-87654321';
UPDATE donors SET total_donations = total_donations + 1000 WHERE donor_id = '1e635c6b-2351-4d63-bc43-7728f4f1b85d';
UPDATE donation_history SET donation_amount = 5000, donation_date = '2023-05-12 08:30:00' WHERE donor_id = '7d94f772-9ee2-4a29-b8c1-8612712bff44';
UPDATE donors SET total_donation_amount = total_donation_amount + 5000 WHERE donor_id = 12345;
UPDATE email_logs SET email_content = 'Thank you for your donation!' WHERE donor_id = 54321;
UPDATE donors SET total_donation_amount = total_donation_amount + 5000.00, last_donation_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE donor_id = 101

UPDATE email_logs SET email_subject = 'Thank you for your donation!', email_content = 'This is an automated message to thank you for your recent donation.', email_sent_date = '2022-07-15 08:30:00' WHERE donor_id = 101
UPDATE donors SET total_donation_amt = 5000.00 WHERE donor_id = 123;
UPDATE donations SET donation_amt = 1000.00, donation_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE donation_id = 456;
UPDATE donors SET total_donation_amt = total_donation_amt + 500 WHERE donor_id = 101;
UPDATE donations SET donation_amt = 1500, donation_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE donor_id = 201;
UPDATE donors SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE donor_id = 1;
UPDATE donations SET donation_amount = 100.00, donation_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE donation_id = 5;
UPDATE donors SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE donor_id = 1;
UPDATE donations SET donation_amount = 1000, donation_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE donation_id = 2;
